Often referred to as the world's most beautiful four-day market, art fairs bring excitement and anticipation to many art patrons. In this regard, Busan in May is gaining global attention as a rising artistic hub. Art Busan 2024 will connect art enthusiasts with the key galleries and artists, and present a unique set of VIP programs that combines Busan's art scene with the exclusive culinary and leisure experience you can only find in Busan.
